definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush

sentences.english: The reflections from the fireworks twinkled in the river.
sentences.chinese: 煙火倒映在河面上，閃爍多姿。

sentences.english: The mist-filled valley and flickering lights below looked strangely welcoming.
sentences.chinese: 薄霧籠罩的山谷和山下閃爍的燈光出奇地好看。

sentences.english: The white felt yurts of the Mongolian people stand out in the sunshine .
sentences.chinese: 在太陽下，那點點水泡似的蒙古包，閃爍着白光。

sentences.english: White flowers glimmered in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 白色的花在月光下閃爍着。

sentences.english: He cried, his blue eyes blazing angrily behind his spectacles.
sentences.chinese: 他咆哮着，眼鏡後的藍眼睛閃爍着熊熊怒火。

sentences.english: They are almost always able to sneak up on their unprepared victims twinkle-toed.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾乎總是能夠偷襲了他們的準備受害者閃爍趾。

sentences.english: The current status of transparent ceramic and some of the important scintillator properties are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了透明陶瓷的研究現狀及閃爍體的一些重要性能。

sentences.english: There are many rays of innovation between lines in the Reprot of the Sixteenth Congress.
sentences.chinese: 黨的“十六大”報告字裏行間處處閃爍着創新的光芒。

sentences.english: The bulb winked at the walls.
You eyes are two pools that twinkle like starts in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你的雙眼是兩汪清泉，就像那夜空中閃爍的星。
她眼睛裏閃爍著調皮的光輝。

sentences.english: All that night the aurora flamed and shimmered lurid colors across the sky to the north.
sentences.chinese: 整個夜晚北面的天際閃爍着忽明忽暗的光芒。

sentences.english: And he rode with a jewelled twinkle.
sentences.chinese: 他閃爍著寶石的光茫而來。

sentences.english: These lights flickered continuously like traffic light which have gone mad.
sentences.chinese: 燈泡一刻一停地閃爍着，就像失去了控制的紅綠燈。

sentences.english: This project generates a simple, flicker-free 2D animation demo. It loads two pictures—a background (big one) and a foreground (small one).
sentences.chinese: 這個項目生成一個簡單的，不閃爍的2D動畫演示。

definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
